definition: individual/this/that/size/classifier for people or objects in general
head/hair style/the top/end/beginning or end/a stub/remnant/chief/boss/side/aspect/first/leading/classifier for pigs or livestock/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: This young chap is very tall.
This kind of watermelon is remarkable for its size.
The twins are of equal height.
sentences.chinese: 這對雙胞胎個頭兒一樣高。

sentences.english: The professor was short and wore a pair of thick glasses.
sentences.chinese: 教授個頭兒不高，戴着一副深度眼鏡。

sentences.english: Can I say I am very big.
sentences.chinese: 那說我的個頭兒很大，可以嗎？

sentences.english: This young chap is of medium height.
Michael wore a dark blue suit and stood tall.
sentences.chinese: 邁克爾穿着深藍色西裝，個頭兒高高的站在那裏。

sentences.english: The fella has a moderate stature.
sentences.chinese: 這個小夥子中等個頭兒。
